name: Pokémon Emerald Dreams
overview: Description: A complete remake and overhaul of the original Pokemon Emerald. The story line is closely linked to the original story. There are changes and additional events. This hack is also a part of the Liquid Crystal timeline, and acts as a prequel to the events that happen in LC Features: • All the Gyms and Caves and Forests and other areas have been completely remapped and redone giving an updated feeling of exploration. • Features a whole set of new custom OW sprites. • Fresh new music remixes of classic Hoenn songs with new sound fonts and instruments. • Remade the entire dialog of the game to be completely new and original. • Custom Pokémon Sprites & Animations. • New Hidden Areas • Raised levels for Increased Difficulty • New Movesets for Rivals and Gyms • New wild Pokémon sets for areas • Obtain 386 Pokémon • Additional Rivals and story events
